Articles.Content:
KSP Version: v1.0.0.830, Windows 32bit on Steam

What Happens:

I have found a game breaking bug while playing. I was flying a jet aircraft with two kerbals in it, Valentina and Jeb. I was flying over water and I accidentally clicked the EVA button instead of IVA. Valentina jumped out of the pod, flew away and kept falling past the water. I switched to her and she disappeared and my view was of space with no planets or anything. I tried to switch back to my aircraft but it was already too far away, I clicked M to see where i was and that was also bugged out. Then i tried to revert the flight, that was also bugged and everything had the same space backdrop. After that I tried to reload the save and it was still bugged out at the space center view with the space backdrop.

Mods / Add-On: Hyperedit

Steps to Replicate: I did not try to replicate.

Fixes/Workarounds: Restart Game.
